document.full_text: apple inc's shares could rise further despite having risen 51 percent over the past one year as the company's mac pcs, ipads and iphones have plenty of room for growth, said brokerage sterne agee.
document.title: apple still has a lot of room to grow: sterne agee
lines_and_colors: apple inc's shares could rise further despite having risen 51 percent over the past one year as the company's mac pcs, ipads and iphones have plenty of room for growth, said brokerage sterne agee.
